title: Bambara (1923) Luke
description: Scan of a Bambara translation of the New Testament published in 1923 by the British and Foreign Bible Society. Bambara is a language of Mali spoken by more than 6,000,000 people.
provider: The British and Foreign Bible Society

language.name: Bambara
language.area: Also in Burkina Faso, Côte d’Ivoire, Gambia, Guinea, Mauritania, Senegal.
